subject: Ghost Box discussion and demo on my show
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
Got an hour to listen to my latest internet radio show while you work 
or play on your computer? I talk about the new methods used to make 
communication attempts with entities & spirits and the other devices I 
have been building (Micro Box and Shadow Detection).
Then I demonstrate each of the 5 different Radio Shack Hack Ghost Box 
System configurations I have put together in recent weeks. Hear some 
for the first time on my show Ghost to Ghost PM.
Hear it here:  http://www.ghosttoghostpm.com

- Mike
